FIELD.NAME: gradetype
FIELD.COMMENT: Constant to indicate the type of grade this is (midterm, final, etc).

FIELD.NAME: revision
FIELD.COMMENT: Each time a user goes to save a new grade, we are going to save it in a new record with a new revision number.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The Moodle course ID where this was submitted from.

FIELD.NAME: submitterid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user ID of the user submitting.

FIELD.NAME: submitterilpid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ILP ID of the user submitting.

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The Moodle user ID of the student being submitted for.

FIELD.NAME: studentilpid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ILP ID of the student we are submitting for.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade string being submitted for the user.

FIELD.NAME: incompletegrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade to use if the incomplete grade isn't completed on time.

FIELD.NAME: incompletedeadline
FIELD.COMMENT: Date to complete a incomplete by.

FIELD.NAME: additionaldata
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional data stored in a json format.

FIELD.NAME: usersubmittime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the user submitted the grade.

FIELD.NAME: ilpsendtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the message was submitted to ILP.
